sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for records in x_1593193_raas_m2m_x_1593193_ra_x_1593193_ra if the record matches the criteria (x_1593193_raas_media.state=1^EQ), for users with role x_1593193_raas.administrador, and if the ACL condition (x_1593193_raas_media.state=1^EQ) evaluates to true.
